            Lindsay N. Hayes
          
          
            
              Lindsay is a researcher in the Department of
              Neuroscience at Johns
              Hopkins University. She studies neuroinflammation and
              microglia biology in the context of health and disease.
              Lindsay uses both clinical samples and animal models to
              investigate the cellular and molecular mechanisms
              underlying neuroinflammation and how it impacts brain
              function and disease phenotypes.
